column5: Hit the lower river today for some big small-mouth action.    Couple of 5 lb. fish    and a 6 lb and 5lb    Would of made a nice weigh-in in a bass tourney    Caught about 20 bass,and lost just as many.Only two bass under 3lbs
Looks like an excellent day, I'm jealous.
Wtg! what did you use? tubes?
If not tubes,they drop shot?  Nice fish there boys.
Niagara river is a great fishery.
Monster smallies in the lower Niagara (And upper for that matter)  Untapped fishery for sure.
Steve - pig smallies, awesome job.  Glad to see you're still out there hammering big fish.  Every time I see your boat the more I want one for myself!!
Holy crapola, that's damned impressive, even catching one of those fish would have made a good day in my books. Then again I don't have your setup nor fish that area. Nice job!
Nice Bass!!! Way to go buddy!
Now that's wranglin' some mules, nice shooting.  Is that a lamprey mark on one of the fish in the 3rd pic?
Wow!!! never tried fishing smallies on the niagara.  Think i'm gonna have to give it a try.  Nice fish!!
Nice looking bronzebacks    Some real hawgs for sure Thanks for sharing Leechman
